backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage mixin and extensive ProcessingJob types for audio/video editing metadata and job tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of various frontend components and utilities for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color system and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading root app container, Vite script, and lamejs for MP3 encoding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication state, profile setup, and routing to dashboard or login.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedAudioEdi: Full-featured audio editor with AI processing controls, visualization displays, and processing workflow management.
frontend/src/components/AudioABPreviewPl: Audio player allowing A/B comparison between original and edited audio with playback, seeking, and volume controls.
frontend/src/components/DualWaveformDisp: Canvas-based audio waveform visualizer using Web Audio API analyser data.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Handles uploading audio/video files, validation, previewing, and triggering backend processing with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JobsList.tsx: Displays user's job history or placeholder message based on selected mode.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting user login with marketing content and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/NLEEditor.tsx: Empty placeholder file for future non-linear editor component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for collecting and saving user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SpectralFrequenc: Renders a canvas-based audio frequency visualizer using Web Audio API and an analyser node tied to an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedVideoEdit: Provides a complex video editing UI with timeline clips, real-time effect controls, and state for playback, rendering, and neural enhancements.
Displays side-by-side original and edited videos with synced playback and optional real-time effect rendering using canvas processing.
frontend/src/components/VideoPreviewMana: UI panel for toggling and adjusting video enhancement effects, notifying parent components of changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context/provider for handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for user profiles and media uploads, including mutations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes with global border and body styling.
frontend/src/lib/aiAudioOrchestrator.ts: Provides prompt-driven audio processing plan generation and simple browser-based audio analysis utilities.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessor.ts: Implements a multi‑stage AI-enhanced audio processing pipeline using Web Audio API with noise suppression, isolation, repair, and EQ.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabs for video editing, file upload, and job history management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors via OKLCH variables, animations, radius, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Contains metadata describing the project's version, architecture, workflows, and known issues for a React + Motoko media‑processing application. Highlights frontend–backend structure, authentication, job handling, audio/video processing methods, and existing technical problems.
